text: Going the Distance is a 2010 American romantic comedy movie directed by Nanette Burstein. It stars Drew Barrymore, Justin Long and Christina Applegate. It is about Erin, a graduate school student from San Francisco who meets a man in New York City and tries to keep the relationship going when she returns home. The movie was released in September 2010. It received mixed reviews from critics, but did very well at the box office. == Other websites == * Category:2010 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in San Francisco
title: Going the Distance (2010 movie)
